name: pgAdmin
description: pgAdmin is the most popular and feature rich Open Source administration and development platform for PostgreSQL, the most advanced Open Source database in the world.
author: pgAdmin Project

form_fields.label: Default Email
form_fields.hint: This is the email address used when setting up the initial administrator account to login to pgAdmin. This variable is required and must be set at launch time.

form_fields.label: Default Password
form_fields.hint: This is the password used when setting up the initial administrator account to login to pgAdmin. This variable is required and must be set at launch time.
